description:
Lamenting the worsening of his eyesight as he grows older day after day, he is the surrogate parent gently overseeing his problematic employees. Ohagi mochi and coffee, Japanese clothing and a café. It`s all about expressing a mix of Japanese and Western styles. He is the manager of the café with a traditional Japanese twist, "Café LycoReco".
Source: Official page
name: Mika
